participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and cheerful, loves adventures and making new friends.
participant_1.background: i am in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys quiet moments and caring for animals.
participant_2.background: i spend my time bird watching with my cats. i'm an animal activist. the holidays make me depressed. my age is too old to say.

content.text: its holiday again and i really need someone to talk to about my new pet
